I apologize for the bug crashes and it taking me so long to fix. The Marine Corps has been keeping me busy. Here is what I got for you this time: 

** Bug fix. The app will no longer crash when you change from one color drop down to the next if you have a character far down the list selected. 

** A lot of people didn't like that I completely got rid of the X and made it a notification. You can now put the X back on the icon in the Settings tab. I apologize that I took that away to some who liked it. The notification will still remain regardless, however, if you X out of the icon using the on-screen X, the "close icon" and "open icon" won't do anything for you. 

I hope you all still enjoy the app. I am still trying to find the time to add screen recognition to the app. Please bare with me! Thanks again for the support!!

** NEW FEATURES!! ** 

** Persistent Notification: The icon can now be closed and opened from the notification created once you "Get Started!" You can also open the app from the notification as well! 

** Icon size: Don't like how big the icon is on your screen? Now pick between Small, Medium, and Large sizes! ** 

** We have now made it so you can change the rating of the hero without it resetting the information! Unit information that does not exist for that rating level will display "n/a". 

** The app now remembers what information you have displayed when you minimize down to the icon! Minimize the information and reopen it to be able to calculate the same character's IV 

We hope you enjoy the new updates! Please continue to notify us of any issues you may have. We will do our best to correct it!
Like the app? Hate the app? Suggestions for the app? Is something incorrect in the app? Send us some feedback so we can make it better!
